title: Jegileman
author: Jegileman
content: Hello my fellow Naija people, I hail wuna all. Na good thing say we get local board and another good thing be say we want make e dey clean of all spams and low quality posts from newbies too. As I check around the forum for other local boards, I see say all the ones wey I check, dem get sticky posts wey dey guide newbies wey just join them and e dey really help them to make their post there free of low quality and free of spam. As I join our local board, I no see any of the posts wey dey sticky to guide newbies well wey just join the local board like me. And as I still go through the board, I see say some high ranked members here don drop topics wey go guide the newbies for here well. Na some of the posts wey I find say dem go really help newbies for the local board and encourage them be this. If the posts dey sticky, e go better pass. Unofficial General Guidelines For Posting (Na de koko dem) - By IgebotzUseful information for Nigerian newbies - By Charles-TimNaija Novice Hangout {Newbies introduction & Orientation}.Thread. - By CryptopreneurBrainboss[CHARTS] Monthly Overview Of Nigeria Local Board/Monthly Merit Reward - By IgebotzPost Quality Review [Monthly BTC Reward] - By SatoPrincessAside from dis one, dey fit get others wey go really help newbies wey I no capture for this my topic. I no know whether anyone go dey again wey go for add to the list. Na my humble suggestion be dis for our local board.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Only moderators can pin a thread, and currently there's no moderator for the Niaji local board; if not, there would have been some pined threads like the ones you suggested above. With time, the local board will have a moderator assigned by theymos, and after that, some pins will exist. For the main time, users (newbies and low ranks) can still easily come across most of these useful threads since the board has not yet been very bulky like others.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: OP your talk go well but the matter be say naa only moderator for do wetin you dey talk about just as bitcoin_strange talk. See as it stands now, Naija local board no get any moderator for this platform so na so why you see say things just be as e be here.  I believe say na gradual process as we dey wait for Theymos to give us our.moderator and merit source so that we go gidibam for platform here make we dey jolly as we see am but I know say when we get wetin we want for this platform the coordination will be handled

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Op weti u tok e no bad but dis your thread sef na spamming thread because there are other threads wey don tok dis matter for plenty times, even the ones you mentioned above discussed what u dey try to tok, weti I dey try to tok be sae, u for make comments on those topics. Though what you dey try to tok e good. There is time for everything, so time is coming for us to have all those things. And for now we need moderators and merit sources and with those everything in the local board go dey okay.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: DaNNy001 on August 14, 2023, 10:25:59 PM watin even dey boder me sef na this exquisite use of English for we local board instead of concrete use of broken or pidgen English. This thing just tire me because I dey see other local board wey na only native tongue them dey use while our own just dey different maybe we too Sabi speak English or watin sef. Well, about that, from my search, Nigeria has about 525 native spoken languages, and if there's use of those languages in the local board, there are going to be so many subboards for those languages. Secondly, there are some of us here who can't write in pidgin English, like myself. I think there are also a few people here who are not Nigerians, but because there's still the use of English in the local board, that's why they are active here, maybe because they can't write In their local language. For me, I don't think it's bad, but if you want to get the opinion of others, then you can start a new topic about that.

comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on August 14, 2023, 10:45:51 PMThough what you dey try to tok e good. There is time for everything, so time is coming for us to have all those things. And for now we need moderators and merit sources and with those everything in the local board go dey okay. If with what Charles-Tim commented above, then we don’t need to wait to have a moderator before we can get our important topics pinned to the board. If there’s a sticky post that can guide the newbies coming to the local board, it’ll help in controlling spamming and low quality posts. Even with merit sources been approved, we need to still have posts of great quality before they can give those posts merits. Just like the merit sources, moderators are important, so is the sticky post because our newbies will find our rules here more easier to guide them and ask questions here than the general board.Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 15, 2023, 07:18:48 AMYes, one of the reputed members like CryptopreneurBrainboss can do it. Everything that we need to pin can all be discussed and be given Brainboss to tell theymos to pin it.It’ll be a good thing for the board generally if we have them just like you suggested it to be done. There was a time a thread was created on this local board by  Hyphen(-) about some newbies getting permanent ban from the forum, which most of them at that time were all from this local board. We want more people in the local board to make our board more active and interactive, for them to know more and learn about bitcoin through here.

comments.author: RahimNda
comments.body: Hello, fellow members of this local bored. I would like to discuss a minor issue about our forum boredom.We applaud our older members for their earnest assistance with mentoring the forum newbies so they can also establish long-lasting connections there.We all deserve to be strong because if we can achieve our goals here, we will all be content. However, I believe that our leaders will desire what is best for us in our local bored.Since the senior members of these local bored are strong, we have to  require a strong contribution.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Jegileman on August 14, 2023, 09:41:16 PMHello my fellow Naija people, I hail wuna all. Na good thing say we get local board and another good thing be say we want make e dey clean of all spams and low quality posts from newbies too. As I check around the forum for other local boards, I see say all the ones wey I check, dem get sticky posts wey dey guide newbies wey just join them and e dey really help them to make their post there free of low quality and free of spam. As I join our local board, I no see any of the posts wey dey sticky to guide newbies well wey just join the local board like me. And as I still go through the board, I see say some high ranked members here don drop topics wey go guide the newbies for here well. Na some of the posts wey I find say dem go really help newbies for the local board and encourage them be this. If the posts dey sticky, e go better pass.Excluding Igebotz posts about our local board rules, I no dey see reasons why other topics deserve to be pinned including my own or any other posts wey be say I dun write here or see here for this local board. If the beginners introduction dey dat important (which isn't necessary from my point of view) we fit input am into the local rules thread and we fit dey keep that thread active with newbies introduction and we interacting with them to help out. You suggestions comes with good faith but abeg wetin concern giveaway or quality review threads with been pinned. All those can end at anytime so no be wetin we suppose dey say deserve pinning. If we wan pin post self e go be like an overview of every important topic wey we feel say dey important to newbies. Instead of separate thread, one thread holds the information and people can be redirected from that thread to the host thread of each of the information wey personal dey find. We no need dey like others, na uniqueness dey sell pass so that's how we should be and not going to copy every other local board we see. The one thread can always be updated by the person wey create am so we no go go back to dey beg for pinned post whenever another better information enter the board wey newbies supposed know and all this can go under the thread created by Igebotz (under the local board rules). Na just my opinion sha be dis and all those suggesting me do something, you don't need my approval to carryout a community project which is what this board is about. Any ideas can be voted and passed by majority vote and sent to the authority to implement.
